title: I. T. - The Secret World of Modern Banking Volume 1
description: Contains issues 1-5 (March-July 2017) of this title."Bank Information Technology expert Evan Adonis works at the nexus of the bank's communications and data networks. The executives' corruption, lies, revenge, and abuse he discovers is terrifying. In the internally corrupt world of modern banking, the IT expert is both the most powerful asset and the most hunted liability."
author: Scott McDaniel
